short_summary: 60 Month Lease of a Production Printer for the Department of National Defence
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for a 60-month lease of one production printer with the option to extend the lease for an additional two one-year periods.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### 60-Month Lease of a Production Printer for the Department of National Defence

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00021485:T

**Publication Date:** January 16, 2023

**Closing Date:** February 9, 2023, 2:00 PM ET

**Contact Information:**
Shared Services Canada
400 Cooper Street, National Capital Region, Ontario, Canada K2P 2H8
Phone: 613-791-6257
Email: [jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:jesse.squirrell@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description:**

The Department of National Defence is seeking a 60-month lease of a production printer with the option to extend the lease for two additional one-year periods. The contract will include the supply, delivery, and installation of the equipment, along with training in English to enable users to access all required features.

**Contract Requirements:**

* Supply, delivery, and installation of the production printer
* Training for users to access all required features
* Lease duration: 60 months with the option to extend for two additional one-year periods

**Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN):**
* JX7025AJ
* N3610C
* WL7025

**Trade Agreement:**
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Tender Categories:**

* Support Services – IT
* Equipment – Computer/office

**Regions of Opportunity:**
World

**Regions of Delivery:**
Manitoba

**Language of Tender:**
English

**Notice URL:**
None
